Exploring community pharmacists-champions motivations for professional services in Australian community pharmacy
{{{h2}}}Exploring community pharmacists-champions motivations for professional services in Australian community pharmacy{{{/h2}}}{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}{{{p}}}Thank you for helping with this research project. Please see a YouTube video below 1.5 minutes long), which will explain how to start the sorting process. We ask you to sort the statements and complete a short questionnaire at the end of the session. Thank you for your participation!{{{/p}}}{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}} {{{center}}}{{{iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lMy4ARVEcCI?rel=0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen}}}{{{/iframe}}}{{{/center}}}

Sign In
{{{center}}}{{{h3}}}Welcome!{{{/h3}}}{{{/center}}}{{{br}}} Thank you for participating in this Q methodology research project. {{{br}}}Please {{{strong}}}sign in{{{/strong}}} using the form below to begin the process.
Welcome!
Thank you for participating in this research project titled 'Exploring community pharmacists-champions motivations for professional services in Australian community pharmacy. You will be asked to work with statements, which have been derived from semi-structured interviews and literature review/scan in this study. This study will take between 30-50 minutes of your time. ' Please click the "{{{b}}}Continue{{{/b}}}" button at the bottom right side of the screen to go to the next step.

Return to Control Panel
Research Consent
You are invited to participate in a research study conducted by [Principal Investigator’s Name] at [Institution or Organization]. Before you decide to participate, it is important that you understand why the research is being conducted and what it will involve. Please take the time to read the following information carefully. Feel free to contact the research team with any questions you may have.{{{br /}}}{{{br /}}}{{{b}}}Purpose of the Study{{{/b}}}{{{br /}}}The purpose of this study is to [briefly describe the purpose, e.g., understand the effects of a new teaching method on student performance]. This research will help us gain insights into [mention any broader implications or goals of the study]. {{{br /}}}{{{br /}}}{{{b}}}Study Procedures{{{/b}}}{{{br /}}}If you agree to participate, you will be asked to [describe the procedures involved, including what participants will do, how long it will take, and how frequently it will occur]. For example, you will be asked to complete evaluate a series of statements, sort them, and then reflect on the sorting. Additionally, there is a short questionnaires at the end. The study will take approximately [duration, e.g., 45 minutes]. {{{br /}}}{{{br /}}}{{{b}}}Benefits{{{/b}}}{{{br /}}}While there may not be direct benefits to you for participating, the information gathered from this study may help [describe potential benefits, e.g., improve educational methods, contribute to scientific knowledge, etc.]. You may also gain personal insights into [describe any personal benefits, if applicable].{{{br /}}}{{{br /}}}{{{b}}}Confidentiality{{{/b}}}{{{br /}}}All information collected in this study will be kept strictly confidential. Data will be stored securely and only the research team will have access to it. Your identity will not be disclosed in any reports or publications resulting from this study. [Describe how data will be anonymized, encrypted, or stored securely].{{{br /}}}{{{br /}}}{{{b}}}Voluntary Participation{{{/b}}}{{{br /}}}Your participation in this study is entirely voluntary. You are free to decline to participate, or to withdraw at any time, without penalty or loss of benefits to which you are otherwise entitled. If you decide to withdraw, close the webpage and any data collected up to that point will be deleted.{{{br /}}}{{{br /}}}{{{b}}}Consent{{{/b}}}{{{br /}}}By clicking on the "Agree" button on the bottom of this page, you are indicating that you have read and understood the information provided, and that you agree to participate in this study. If you have any questions about this study, please contact [Principal Investigator’s Name and Contact Information].
Contact Information
Thank you for participating in this University Research Project. You can contact the research team by phone (0415171981) or by email at vsed0158@uni.sydney.edu.au
Preliminary Sorting
Most important #3
Statements
Neutral #2
Least important #1
Step 1 of 4
The statements you will see in this study are from semi-structured interviews and literature, therefore they may seem very ambiguous at times. Please read the following statements carefully and split them up into three piles: a pile for statements you think are most important, a pile for statements you think are least important, and a pile for the rest. Changes can be made later.{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}If you want to read this instruction a second time, click the help-button at the bottom left corner.{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}{{{center}}}{{{iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vtnLuKzpcKQ?rel=0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen}}}{{{/iframe}}}{{{/center}}}
Navigation Disabled
Please finish the preliminary sorting before going to the next step.
Preliminary Sorting Complete
You have completed this step. Thank you. Please click the "Continue" button in the bottom right side of the page to go to the next step.
This study explores pharmacists' motivations for professional services in community pharmacy. We are interested in your view to what are important elements of best possible implementation of professional services. Please sort the statements according to your experience:
{{{b}}}To what extent do these statements align with the best possible implementation of professional services in community pharmacy?{{{/b}}}{{{div style="font-size: 24px"}}}Click and drag on the cards or press the "1", "2", or "3" keys.{{{/div}}}
Step 2 of 4
In this step, please click and drag the statement cards to the appropriate column based on your perspective and the researcher's instructions at the top of the page. You can make the statements font smaller by using the navigation at the bottom of the page. {{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}{{{center}}}{{{iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iRxC9Vv3dLo?rel=0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen}}}{{{/iframe}}}{{{/center}}}
{{{b}}}Most important{{{/b}}}
{{{b}}}Least important{{{/b}}}
Sort the statements according to your experience: {{{b}}}To what extent do these statements align with the best possible implementation of professional services in community pharmacy?{{{/b}}}
Sorting Complete
Thank you. You have completed the initial sorting. Please take a moment to confirm your placement of the statements.{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}When you are satisfied with their placement, please click on the {{{b}}}blue "Continue" button{{{/b}}} at the bottom right-side of your screen to go to the next step.
Navigation Disabled
Please finish the grid sorting before going to the next step.
Navigation Disabled
One of the columns has too many cards (it will be outlined in orange and have a dashed border). Please adjust the placement of the cards so that all columns have the correct number.

Post-Sort Questionnaire
Step 4 of 4
Finally, please answer the following questions regarding your background.
